mapper.insert: insert into tb_login (user_id, login_account, login_pwd, login_token, last_login_time, statu, remark) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statu,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select user_id, login_account, login_pwd, login_token, last_login_time, statu, remark from tb_login
